description: Initial game: two-player castle siege with 140 AI soldiers, 5 roles (sword, spear, archer, gunner, catapult), 7 game phases, WebSocket networking at 20Hz, and 60fps canvas rendering
Wall roles (archer, gunner) now spawn on battlements and stay clamped to their team's wall segment instead of spawning on the ground
Hit feedback particle effects (sparks, blood) on combat impacts
Help overlay with controls reference and touch-screen mobile control panel
Renderer overhaul: atmospheric sky gradients, parallax clouds, detailed castle artwork, improved ground and battlefield visuals
Camera system refactored with smooth follow and zoom; tick rate bumped from 20Hz to 30Hz
Weapon balance: archer range 800->950, gunner range 6000->1400, catapult range 1200->1600, rock speed 250->300, rock AoE 60->90
Special ability cooldown constants for all five roles (whirlwind, dash, volley, grenade, rapid fire)
Shield blocking now gives proper visual and gameplay feedback; sky aiming corrected for ranged roles
Disconnection handling: players now see a 'Disconnected' message with refresh prompt instead of a frozen screen
Player controls extracted into dedicated server/systems/player-controls.js module; spatial hash optimized
Unit tests for spatial hash grid and player controls
API documentation in docs/API.md
Particle system rewritten with object pooling, gravity, bounce, and multiple effect types (sparks, blood, dust, shield)
Cleanup: removed backup renderer and particle files, consolidated into final versions
Royal stats buffed significantly: HP 1000->8000, king damage 25->40, queen damage 22->35
Gate damage now works for all projectile types (arrows, bullets, rocks) instead of only rocks; added GATE_ARROW_DAMAGE, GATE_BULLET_DAMAGE, GATE_HIT_DIST constants
Spectator camera now moves freely instead of being locked to a single position
Royal AI: king and queen no longer stack on top of each other thanks to repulsion force; royals pass friendly list for separation behavior
Royal HP reduced from 8000 to 3000 after initial overbuff
Spawn protection: players are invulnerable for 3 seconds after respawning
Royal tether system: royals stay within 800 units of their home castle and retreat if they wander too far
Defender victory condition: defenders now win if all attacking players are eliminated (out of lives) during FINAL_STAND, not just when royals die
Single player (solo) mode: PLAY SOLO button in lobby starts the game with one player, no need to wait for an opponent
Solo mode balance: royal HP reduced to 750 (from 8000) in solo games so a single player can actually win
Solo button styling: purple background color applied correctly
Parabolic projectile trajectories: arrows and rocks now arc through the air with height proportional to shot distance, rendered client-side via sin(progress) curve
Projectile aiming: physics aimY re-clamped to ground plane to prevent shots flying into space, while visual aim remains free for trajectory display
